statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerData;
SELECT customer_name, total_sales FROM CustomerData;
SELECT customer_name, registration_date FROM CustomerData ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, total_sales FROM CustomerData WHERE total_sales > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, registration_date, total_sales FROM CustomerData;
SELECT customer_name, total_sales FROM CustomerData WHERE registration_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM CustomerData WHERE total_sales > 1000 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, SUM(total_sales) AS total_sales_sum FROM CustomerData GROUP BY customer_name HAVING SUM(total_sales) > 5000 ORDER BY total_sales_sum DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, registration_date, total_sales FROM CustomerData WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY registration_date ASC, total_sales DESC;
SELECT AVG(total_sales) AS avg_sales FROM CustomerData;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT customer_name, date_of_birth FROM customers ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, city FROM customers ORDER BY city ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, product_name FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE city = 'New York' ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT customer_name, SUM(amount) AS total_spent FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name HAVING total_spent > 500;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY amount DESC, transaction_date;

SELECT customer_name, product_name, amount FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id WHERE city = 'Los Angeles' AND product_name LIKE '%Shoes%' ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_age FROM customers WHERE customer_age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 100;
SELECT customer_name, interaction_date FROM customers JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_age FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date, purchase_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM customers LEFT JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id WHERE interaction_type = 'Email';

SELECT customer_name, purchase_date, purchase_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE purchase_amount BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;

SELECT customer_name, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM customers LEFT JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id WHERE interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY signup_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price > 50;
SELECT customer_name, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM customers JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, signup_date FROM customers ORDER BY signup_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price > 50;
SELECT purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM purchases WHERE purchase_amount >= 100 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM customers INNER JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, join_date FROM customers ORDER BY join_date ASC;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_name, category FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_purchases FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_purchases > 5;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, join_date FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 3;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND product_id BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, order_date, total_amount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
